formatted_address: 10 Collyer Quay B1-08 Ocean Financial Centre, Singapore 049315
name: Salmon Samurai

reviews.text: Excellent! Friendly staff, fast service, really great food and reasonably priced. What do you want? Highly recommend.

Taste is ok but i paid $4 for avocado and brocoli topup of my bara chirashi takeaway don but didnt receive these in my bowl.

Updated: Received the refund from shop.

Healthy food,, very colorful and nice looking, served in paper take away bowls, very little space for seats, sit outside table is one direction facing the wall at an inclined slope. Good for a fast meal for convenience.

a small shop w limited seating. the food was delicious though! the salmon tasted very good and the portions were more than enough! iâ€™d recommend the soba noodles for the base, it comes with a really delicious sauce ðŸ¤¤

Behold the salmon sashimi don petite size: $14.90 for 3 slices of salmon. The avocado is actually 1 slice but with added cuts to look like itâ€™s 3 slices.

At double digit prices, this should not be the amount of fish and avocado provided.

Food was subpar as well. Salmon was average, about same quality as donki. Broccoli is unseasoned and tasteless. Seaweed for the edamame had a fishiness to it that wasnâ€™t very pleasant.

Pass by this place every day for work and decided to try it today. Once is enough. There are plenty of lunch options nearby with better food for better value.

vicinity: 10 Collyer Quay B1-08 Ocean Financial Centre
